Package org.jboss.windup.reporting.config

Class Hint

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ocpsoft.rewrite.config.DefaultOperationBuilder
      • org.jboss.windup.config.operation.GraphOperation
        • org.jboss.windup.config.operation.iteration.AbstractIterationOperation<T>
          • org.jboss.windup.config.parameters.ParameterizedIterationOperation<FileLocationModel>
            • org.jboss.windup.reporting.config.Hint
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HintDisplayMode, HintEffort, HintLink, HintQuickfix, HintText, HintWithIssueCategory, org.ocpsoft.rewrite.config.Operation, org.ocpsoft.rewrite.config.OperationBuilder, org.ocpsoft.rewrite.param.Parameterized
    public class Hint
extends ParameterizedIterationOperation<FileLocationModel>
implements HintText, HintLink, HintWithIssueCategory, HintEffort, HintQuickfix, HintDisplayMode
    Used as an intermediate to support the addition of InlineHintModel objects to the graph via an Operation.

      • withEffort

        public HintEffort withEffort​(int effort)
        Description copied from interface: HintText
        Adds effort to the Hint. The effort represents the level of effort required to fix a task. Use this only if you do not want to specify the link, otherwise you will specify the effort later.
        Specified by:
        withEffort in interface HintDisplayMode
        Specified by:
        withEffort in interface HintLink
        Specified by:

        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        effort - number of effort to be added to hint
        Returns:
        the final stage of hint building

      • withTags

        public org.ocpsoft.rewrite.config.OperationBuilder withTags​(Set<String> tags)
        Description copied from interface: HintEffort
        Adds a tag to the Hint. Tag represents a technology which given hint describes. For example: java-ee-6, jpa-2, jpa, jms, websphere.
        Specified by:
        withTags in interface HintEffort
        Specified by:
